outputs.output_descr: Promoting Women's Political Leadership and Governance.  Government, parliamentarians, communities and families have increased awareness on Convention on the Rights of the Child and CEDAW and particularly on abuse, exploitation and violence against children and women.

project_descr: Increased and effective participation of women in decision making and in development activities.
